医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
威尔康奈尔医学院获得疾病预防控制中心拨款，以改善对年轻乳腺癌患者的护理威尔康奈尔医学公司 (Weill Cornell Medicine) 获得了美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 提供的为期 5 年、价值 230 万美元的拨款，用于改善患有各个阶段乳腺癌的年轻人获得公平护理的机会、提高生活质量和生存结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-CDC-grant-to-improve-care-for-young-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-CDC-grant-to-improve-care-for-young-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f715e6c-b368-4640-bcad-106fe765bc5d Mon, 06 Jan 2025 10:45:13 -0500 Weill Cornell Medicine receives CDC grant to improve care for young breast cancer patients
听：NPR 和 KFF 健康新闻探讨种族主义和暴力如何损害健康KFF 健康新闻中西部记者卡拉·安东尼 (Cara Anthony) 和 NPR 播客“Shortwave”的主持人艾米丽·邝 (Emily Kwong) 谈论了生活在社区私刑和警察杀戮之后的黑人家庭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Listen-NPR-and-KFF-Health-News-explore-how-racism-and-violence-hurt-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Listen-NPR-and-KFF-Health-News-explore-how-racism-and-violence-hurt-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a043e7d-141a-408b-b40d-c25a89b48a32 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 09:12:00 -0500 Listen: NPR and KFF Health News explore how racism and violence hurt health
研究揭示了小鼠大脑中嗅觉和听觉如何相互作用想象一下，您正在参加一个晚宴，但您听不到烹饪食物的味道或听到晚宴铃声。听起来像一个梦，对吧？如果不是呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Study-reveals-how-smell-and-hearing-interact-in-mouse-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Study-reveals-how-smell-and-hearing-interact-in-mouse-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=980dcc13-4fcf-4157-871b-a692ccae91e Mon, 06 Jan 2025 09:00:11 -0500 Study reveals how smell and hearing interact in mouse brains
新加坡国立大学研究人员利用磁场脉冲增强化疗新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 的研究人员开发了一种非侵入性方法，可以提高化疗的有效性，同时减少其有害的副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/NUS-researchers-enhance-chemotherapy-with-Magnetic-field-pulses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/NUS-researchers-enhance-chemotherapy-with-Magnetic-field-pulses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c072e79b-0526-4ced-bc9c-a09064bdf3ca Mon, 06 Jan 2025 08:54:57 -0500 NUS researchers enhance chemotherapy with magnetic field pulses
新的 CryoSCAPE 技术旨在提高研究用血液样本的稳定性你的血液是一种微妙的混合物。研究人员和临床医生经常使用血液来了解我们体内发生的情况，部分原因是虹吸管中的血液比对内脏器官进行活组织检查更容易且疼痛更少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/New-CryoSCAPE-technology-aims-to-improve-blood-sample-stability-for-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/New-CryoSCAPE-technology-aims-to-improve-blood-sample-stability-for-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0344cb26-89bc-430f-a7ba-5ca2da8fed90 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 08:29:34 -0500 New CryoSCAPE technology aims to improve blood sample stability for research
伯明翰大学获得 350 万英镑用于研究关节炎治疗反应近年来，强大的生物疗法和靶向合成疗法的治疗改变了关节炎的面貌，但目前为每个人找到合适的治疗方法还需要反复试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/University-of-Birmingham-receives-c2a335-million-to-study-arthritis-treatment-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/University-of-Birmingham-receives-c2a335-million-to-study-arthritis-treatment-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54bb4c47-6fd6-49a0-9fd1-aaca7e79c0f1 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 07:44:43 -0500 University of Birmingham receives £3.5 million to study arthritis treatment responses
新的 GFR 公式可更好地诊断老年患者的过度滤过年度健康检查定期包括尿液检查，其用途有多种，包括检查肾脏疾病的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/New-GFR-formula-offers-better-diagnosis-of-hyperfiltration-in-elderly-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/New-GFR-formula-offers-better-diagnosis-of-hyperfiltration-in-elderly-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c90934c9-f8d8-408b-8447-6f083674a2fa Mon, 06 Jan 2025 07:39:33 -0500 New GFR formula offers better diagnosis of hyperfiltration in elderly patients
Paxlovid 的延长疗程为一些长期感染新冠病毒的患者带来了希望近距离观察患者在不同时间和剂量下对该药物的反应，为最近的一项发现增添了细微差别，即 Paxlovid 不会对新冠病毒长期有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Extended-course-of-Paxlovid-shows-promise-for-some-long-Covid-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Extended-course-of-Paxlovid-shows-promise-for-some-long-Covid-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3612190-8cb6-4e21-b05b-90fffd42b14e Mon, 06 Jan 2025 07:30:00 -0500 Extended course of Paxlovid shows promise for some long Covid patients
Inogen 的 SIMEOX 200 气道清除装置获得 FDA 510(k) 许可Inogen, Inc. 是一家提供用于家庭护理环境的创新呼吸产品的医疗技术公司，今天宣布其 SIMEOX 200 气道清除装置已获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 510(k) 批准，扩大了该公司的业务范围在美国营销和满足慢性呼吸道疾病患者的各种需求的能力https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Inogen-receives-FDA-510(k)-clearance-for-SIMEOX-200-airway-clearance-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Inogen-receives-FDA-510(k)-clearance-for-SIMEOX-200-airway-clearance-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6a051c3-3aff-4b5a-90dd-7b81def574c7 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 06:18:00 -0500 Inogen receives FDA 510(k) clearance for SIMEOX 200 airway clearance device
ING5 调节肺癌细胞的代谢重编程肺癌因其高死亡率而臭名昭著，是全球癌症相关死亡的主要原因，而转移是导致患者预后不良的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/ING5-regulates-metabolic-reprogramming-in-lung-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/ING5-regulates-metabolic-reprogramming-in-lung-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a8a4ec8-5c20-4c39-83a2-cdc5692dc037 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 06:14:00 -0500 ING5 regulates metabolic reprogramming in lung cancer cells
